name: Click.
description:
A short horror platformer.

Click to shapeshift
You can not be seen when you are a dog, but you can not be a dog forever.
Dont get close to the dark ones when you are not a dog.
F11 toggles fullscreen

An extremely short game I made for ludem dare 35 this weekend.

The premise is that you are a dark one, and you kill a blue one to take their blue robes which grant you the ability to shapeshift. However you can not stay shapeshifted for as long as you want, and must use it to avoid being seen.
